moduslam.logger package

Submodules

moduslam.logger.logging_config module

Configures the logger for the moduslam package.

moduslam.logger.logging_config.get_config(log_file: Path, level: str = 'INFO') → dict[source]

Returns a dictionary with the logging configuration.

Parameters:

  • log_file – file to write the logs to.

  • level – logging level. Default is INFO.

Returns:

logging configuration.

moduslam.logger.logging_config.setup_logger(config: LoggerConfig) → None[source]

Sets up the logger with the specified configuration.

Parameters:

config – logger configuration.
